meta.set: Base game tile set A–X (72 tiles, 24 unique types)
meta.tile_id_scheme: Letters A–X (as in many rulebooks / tile lists)
notes: Field connectivity is represented via 8 edge-half ports (Nw,Ne,En,Es,Se,Sw,Ws,Wn).
Meeple placement points are auto-derived from port geometry and pulled inward; they are intended as UI markers (not pixel-perfect).
Inns/Cathedrals tags are included for expansion-compatibility; they are false/zero for the base game.
